title: Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress
content:
Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Baldur's Gate Reward --

Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress

Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress can be acquired during Act 3. This quest can be obtained when you reach Baldur's Gate. All Baldur's Gate quests will be grouped together in your quest journal. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress Objectives

Find a way to get into Wyrm's Rock For

Wyrm's Rock is closed due to the ordination of Gortash - who is about to become Archduke of Baldur's Gate. There must be someone, or something, in Wyrm's Crossing that could help us gain entry.

Find a way into Wyrm's Rock Fortress Walkthrough

Before confrontation with Gortash, Dark Urge can walk in through the gate by speaking to Blaze Elin at the gate. Alternatively, you can get a pass from Valeria (Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders), or from Arfur Gregario, the Toymaker (Investigate the Suspicious Toys). Get A report on Duke Ravengard at Sword Coast Couriers. Or simply convince the Guards to let you in. Once you break into Iron Throne and save the Gondians, the Wyrm's Rock Fortress is closed by Gortash's order. You can jump to the surrounding areas of the fortress, then climb to the main level of the fortress.

How to unlock Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress

Quest Giver / Location

Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress Rewards
